abstract: Members of the Screen Actors Guild will now have their say on a proposed new contract that is little changed from what the major Hollywood studios offered 10 months ago.
snippet: Members of the Screen Actors Guild will now have their say on a proposed new contract that is little changed from what the major Hollywood studios offered 10 months ago.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Members of the Screen Actors Guild will now have their say on a proposed new contract with the major Hollywood studios, after a majority of the union’s national board voted on Sunday to accept a deal that is little changed from what the studios offered 10 months ago.

headline.main: SAG Members to Vote on Contract Much Like Initial Offer
headline.print_headline: SAG Members to Vote on Contract Much Like Initial Offer

abstract: Adobe expects TVs that support its Flash format to start selling later this year, offering content creators a single format for an expanding ecosystem of digital devices.
snippet: Adobe expects TVs that support its Flash format to start selling later this year, offering content creators a single format for an expanding ecosystem of digital devices.
lead_paragraph: The denizens of Hollywood and Silicon Valley have, by and large, vastly different value systems, role models, even tastes in cars, food and clothing.

headline.main: Adobe in Push to Spread Web Video to TV Sets
headline.print_headline: Adobe in Push to Spread Web Video to TV Sets
